text: Robert "Roy" Torrens OBE (17 May 1948 â€“ January 2021) was an Irish cricketer and manager. He managed and played for the Ireland cricket team. He represented Ireland six times in first-class cricket between 1966 and 1982. Torrens was appointed Officer of the Order of the British Empire (OBE) in the 2009 Birthday Honours. Torrens died in January 2021, aged 72. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Irish sportspeople Category:Irish cricketers
title: Roy Torrens
